message: Bob, I believe this product would be incredibly valuable to you, and I'm offering it to you first.  I'm asking for $1,500,000.
Thank you for considering my offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am unable to meet the price of $1,500,000. I am willing to pay up to $1,200,000 for the product.
Bob, I understand your position, but the value of this product is truly significant.  I could come down to $1,350,000, which I believe is a fair reflection of its worth.
I've reviewed your latest offer, Alice. While I understand the value of the product, I am still unable to meet the price of $1,350,000. I am willing to pay up to $1,250,000 for the product.
